title: Dev Proxy MockStdioResponsePlugin mocks
description: Mocks for the Dev Proxy MockStdioResponsePlugin

$schema.description: The JSON schema reference for validation.

request.description: The request pattern to match against stdin.

bodyFragment.description: (Optional) A fragment of the stdin body to match. If null or empty, the mock matches any stdin or is applied immediately on startup.

nth.description: (Optional) Match the nth occurrence. If not specified, matches every occurrence.

stdout.description: The stdout content to return. Can be a string, object, or array. If the value starts with @, it's treated as a file path.

stderr.description: The stderr content to return. Can be a string, object, or array. If the value starts with @, it's treated as a file path.
